ProductInfo.Features:

<7> Zeikos 50" Compact Tripod + <8> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <9> PD 5pc Complete Cleaning Kit +
<10> PD Flexible Table Mini Tripod + <11> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <12> LCD Screen Protectors
